testcase.name: I can see search suggestions for valid search terms - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am at the advanced search page of Wikipedia.........................passed When I input a search term "face" in the search box.........................passed And I click the search box for suggestions to pop up........................passed Then Search suggestions should be displayed.................................passed And Suggestions should contain suggestion "facebook"........................passed
